response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product holds immense value to me, as it represents years of innovation and dedication to quality. However, I understand its true worth lies in finding the right person who can appreciate and utilize its capabilities to their fullest potential.

Considering its exceptional features and the impact it could have on your endeavors, I am offering you the chance to own this product at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects my belief in your ability to make the most of its capabilities.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you wish to proceed with the purchase. I am here to answer any questions you might have and to ensure that this product becomes a valuable asset in your life or business.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
